name: Escape from The Soviet Union
description:
You are an American spy planted deep in the heart of the Soviet system. But when the KGB gets wind of you, you know you have to flee... or die. Can you escape the USSR before you are caught?

This is a turn-based strategy game with 4 levels. Higher levels will have more KGB officers, faster enemy movement, and less porous borders. Good Luck!

Made in Python with Pygame.

All credits are in the "Credits" text file contained in the downloadable zip file.

Note: Pressing D in game enables Debug Mode, which gives the player full visibility. Do not enable debug mode if you want to enjoy the game.
